example.eg: What is the purpose of this trip to the store?
example.egtrans: 到商店去这一趟是为什么？

example.eg: My purpose in life is to serve others.
example.egtrans: 我人生的目的是为他人服务。

example.eg: Knowing that he was facing a deadline, he really worked with purpose.
example.egtrans: 知道截止日期快到了，他工作的意志十分坚决。

example.eg: It is hard work, but it's all to good purpose.
example.egtrans: 这是份艰苦的工作，不过一切都是为了好的结果。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 结果, 效果, 效用

example.eg: He purposed to learn to cook.
Zingo is a powerful all-purpose cleaner for floors, walls and ceilings.
All-purpose flour is great for cookies, but doesn't have enough gluten for bread.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 通用面粉, 普通面粉, 不含发酵粉的面粉

example.eg: The whole meeting was nothing but cross-purpose and confusion.
A committee was formed for the purpose of determining the cause of the fire.
example.egtrans: 为了确定火灾的原因，我们成立了一个委员会。

example.eg: Let us assume, for the purpose of this discussion, that the mayor will be reelected.
This multipurpose piece of furniture can serve as a chair, couch, or bed.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 多功能的, 多用途的

example.eg: I'm sorry! I didn't do it on purpose.
example.egtrans: 我很抱歉！我不是故意的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 特别建造的, 针对特定目的专门建造的

example.eg: Lying would serve no purpose because the truth will come out later.
If you don't have a shovel to dig with, a sharp stick just might serve the purpose.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对于目标有用, 契合目的, 达到目的

example.eg: Every lesson you plan to teach should have a set purpose.

dsense.name: statement of purpose
dsense.guideword: (part of university application) (大学入学申请的一部分)
